channel.title: PC on Tom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PC on Tom's Blog

item.title: Asus TUF Gaming Z790-Plus WIFI - My UEFI/BIOS Settings
item.description: Learn about the optimal UEFI BIOS settings for the Asus TUF Gaming Z790-Plus WIFI motherboard, including configurations for RAM, power management, virtualization, and more.

item.title: Asus ROG STRIX Z590-E GAMING WIFI - my UEFI BIOS settings
item.description: Learn about the optimal UEFI BIOS settings for the Asus ROG STRIX Z590-E GAMING WIFI motherboard, including configurations for RAM, power management, virtualization, and more.

item.title: Building new Linux desktop
item.description: Learn about building a new Linux desktop with a focus on performance and stability, including hardware selection and considerations for Ubuntu.
